Reproducible: Always

comments.text:
Created attachment 532397
google adsense text ad 300x250 found on swapalease.com
comments.author: Dave@thisendupproductionsllc.com

comments.raw_text:
This works in the Firefox safemode which disables the hardware acceleration.
This could be different font metrics and this could be just a bad assumption by the ads about the font metrics.

Tip: Use F5 if you get a page without google ads.
comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.text:
